name: web-icons-generator-cli-mcp
description: Generate all required web app icons from a single source image
long_description: Automatically generate all essential web app icons (favicon, PWA icons, Apple touch icon, maskable icon, Safari pinned tab, and manifest) from a single source image. Supports SVG and PNG inputs, auto-detects frameworks (Next.js, Astro, SvelteKit, Remix, Vite), and generates icons in the correct directory with zero configuration.

tools.name: generate_web_icons
tools.description: Generate all required web app icons from a source image (SVG, PNG, or JPG)

tools.name: auto_generate_icons
tools.description: Automatically find app-icon.svg or app-icon.png and generate all web icons

tools.name: check_icons_status
tools.description: Check which web icons exist and which are missing in a project

tools.name: integrate_icons_html
tools.description: Add or update icon link tags in HTML files automatically
